segments.text: My god , it's such a lovely lake ! The lake has a water surface of 56 square kilometers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No wonder it looks so huge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are now walking on what is in fact an island . Here we get one of the 10 sceneries of the West Lake , Autumn Moon over the Calm Lake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why is it called Autumn Moon over the Calm Lake ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's so named because in the pavilion over there the great poet Bai Buyi of the Tang Dynasty would take a rest after drinking a little too much , and watch the moon over the lake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now let's board the boat and have a ride on the lake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ( They get on the boat ) .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wang , what's that building over there ? It looks like some sort of a huge pavilion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . That's the Heart of Lake Pavilion , situated on an islet.It was built in 1552 and is the largest pavilion on the West Lake . Oh , here we are at the Little Yingzhou island . Let's get off the boat . Please watch your steps .
segments.speaker: S2
